title: Russian Void Blizzard cyberspies linked to Dutch police breach
summary: A previously unknown Russian-backed cyberespionage group now tracked as Void Blizzard has been linked to a September 2024 Dutch police security breach. [...]

title: Employees Searching Payroll Portals on Google Tricked Into Sending Paychecks to Hackers
summary:
Threat hunters have exposed a novel campaign that makes use of search engine optimization (SEO) poisoning techniques to target employee mobile devices and facilitate payroll fraud.

title: Windows Server emergency update fixes Hyper-V VM freezes, restart issues
summary: Microsoft has released an emergency update to address a known issue causing some Hyper-V virtual machines with Windows Server 2022 to freeze or restart unexpectedly. [...]

title: Adidas warns of data breach after customer service provider hack
summary: German sportswear giant Adidas disclosed a data breach after attackers hacked a customer service provider and stole some customers' data. [...]

title: Hackers Are Calling Your Office: FBI Alerts Law Firms to Luna Moth’s Stealth Phishing Campaign
summary:
The U.S. Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) has warned of social engineering attacks mounted by a criminal extortion actor known as Luna Moth targeting law firms over the past two years.

title: Russia-Linked Hackers Target Tajikistan Government with Weaponized Word Documents
summary:
The Russia-aligned threat actor known as TAG-110 has been observed conducting a spear-phishing campaign targeting Tajikistan using macro-enabled Word templates as an initial payload.
